channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloudflare -- cfnts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloudflare -- cfnts

item.title: CVE-2023-3036|2024-08-02T06:41:04.398Z -- cloudflare -- cfnts
item.description: An unchecked read in NTP server in github.com/cloudflare/cfnts prior to commit 783490b https://github.com/cloudflare/cfnts/commit/783490b913f05e508a492cd7b02e3c4ec2297b71 Â enabled a remote attacker to trigger a panic by sending an NTSAuthenticator packet with extension length longer than the packet contents.
